pike-stand.description: Advanced pike position with deeper compression. Focus on maintaining straight legs while increasing shoulder flexion.

body-row.description: Advanced body row with elevated feet or added resistance. Focus on full range of motion and controlled tempo.
tips: Full range of motion to chest

lunge.description: Advanced lunge variations including jumping lunges or weighted lunges. Focus on explosive power and stability.

hollow.description: Advanced hollow body hold with leg extensions or rock variations. Maintain core tension throughout.
tips: Rock forward and back if able
